Author: MissNietzsche
Text: I understand the competitiveness about the restriction, but what I don't understand is the competitiveness of bingeing. Perhaps it's not a competition of bingeing though and rather a competition of suffering, as we think, and probably rightfully so, more bingeing=more suffering.  I don't know why we would care about that though.  Of course, restricting is suffering too, but trying to be thin is our whole lives, so that one makes sense at least.

Author: fruitymctootieroll
Text: i really hate how i feel like i HAVE TO eat the least amount when eating around other people and i hate it sm
